attributes.action: to uphold the already existing british constitution of 1689 aswell as the irrefutable rights as stated in magna carter,first statute of westminister and the rule of the common law of the land over the decite of statitory legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: basicaly we a living in a sham, where by were are decived into being goverened by the rule of consent, without ever having that consent asked from us. We understand our rights under common law, and how under such the state would certainly be held accountable for numerous crimes. also as stated under the bill of rights 1689 we our our own sovirigns and as such will not be subject to laws dicated from overseas and as such will class all directives from the Centralized EU or the puppet masters at billderberg and the likes as treason

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
